BDI Machine Learning

Information about the University of Oxford Big Data Institute Machine Learning Theme.

View the Project on GitHub

  • View On GitHub

About

This site provides information about the Machine Learning Theme at the University of Oxford Big Data Institute.

The theme is organised by Professor Christopher Yau.

If you wish to subscribe to information about events, you can subscribe to the mailing list.

15 November 2023 BDI-IEU Workshop Joint workshop between the BDI and the MRC Integrative Epidemiology Unit

15 November 2023 Accurate proteome-wide missense variant effect prediction with AlphaMissense Clare Bycroft (Google Deepmind)
